Responsabilita' di studi e ricerche scie.content: Research grant for a one-month research collaboration with the Dept. of Biophysical and Electronic Engineering (DIBE) - University of Genoa (Prof. B. Bianco) on the following topic: “Definition of optimality criteria for the choice of the parameters for the Cole-Davidson model, and application to a particular case”.

Two-years research grant as a Post-Doc at the University of Genoa on the following topic: “Graph processing through machine learning, optimization, and non-linear approximation". I concluded this contract on 05/09/2013 because on 06/09/2013 I joined the IMT - School for Advanced Studies, Lucca, as Assistant Professor.

Two-years research grant (while working as Assistant Professor at the IMT - School for Advanced Studies, Lucca) for an external research collaboration with the Dept. of Computer Science, Bioengineering, Robotics, and Systems Engineering (DIBRIS) - University of Genoa (Prof. G. Volpe) on the following topic: “Application of graph-analysis techniques to the study of motion performance of violin players to design violin teaching supporting systems”. The collaboration is in the context of the EU project 2016-2018 H2020 ICT TELMI (Technology Enhanced Learning of Musical Instrument performance: http://telmi.upf.edu).
